Do you want to exit to main menu?
Do you really want to exit the game?
Go back to the main menu?
A slightly multiplied ambient light around the player is improving visibility
稍许增加玩家周围的环境光提高能见度
SVOGI - Sparse Voxel Octree Global Illumination. This feature enables high quality indirect lighting. [Medium: occlusion only] [High: Full GI] [Very High: Best Full GI]
SVOTI - 全局照明。本功能会激活高质量间接光照效果。 【中等：仅排除部分】 【高：全GI】 【非常高：最佳全GI】
Number of enemies with optimized animation
This mode is meant to be used along with the LOW mode. It greatly improves performance. It disables many graphical effects, but can result to break some rendering elements, like the hair
【实验性质】需要和低特效配合使用。可以大幅提高性能，但会关闭大部分特效，可能导致部分元素显示出现问题，例如头发。
camera shake when hitting an ennemy
小地图上的任务标志。金色表示主线任务，银色表示支线任务。
You must restart Wolcen in order to have your chosen language fully fonctionnal
您必须重新启动Wolcen，以使您选择的语言完全生效
Automatically attack AIs when the movement button is pressed
按下移动按钮时自动攻击AI
The camera center is fixed to the player
镜头中心固定在玩家身上
Auto equip the potion you loot if you have a free slot
如果有一个空闲栏位，捡起的药水会自动装备
Auto equip a skill you learn if you have a free slot
如果你有一个空闲栏位，学习的技能会自动装备
Auto equip the armor you loot if you have a free slot
如果你有一个空闲栏位，捡起的护甲会自动装备
敌人周围显示红色轮廓
互动物体周围显示黄色轮廓
友军周围显示绿色轮廓
Show Damages when an enemy is hit
Display text around your character like "Dodged", "Blocked" or "+X gold"
在角色周围显示 "闪避", "格挡" 或 "+X 金币"
覆盖当前已保存的游戏？
载入上一次保存的游戏
本地存储，无需网络连接。
Press any key to rebind or Escape to cancel
按任意键修改绑定或按Esc键取消
